text: An EC2 instance accesses AWS services using an IAM role. If no role is attached, API calls such as S3 access will fail with AccessDenied errors.
For AWS ECR access, EC2 instances require the ecr:GetAuthorizationToken permission and Docker must authenticate using aws ecr get-login-password.
CrashLoopBackOff indicates repeated container crashes. Common causes include application errors, missing environment variables, or invalid entrypoints.
